author: Gareth G
title: Overlooks Times Square-right there! Exciting views and walk everywhere.
text:
Ok its New York and you have to pay to be in heart of action with all hotels- but the Novotel offers a great standard for the average NY price. Fabulous staff and food was usual excellent hotel standard for breakfast. Had a lots of laughs discussing Aussie differences with the bar staff who happily advised best restaurants and attractions- would staff anywhere else as you walk out the door and you are in IT!
